title: mdbx_cursor_put: MDBX_EKEYMISMATCH: The given key value is mismatched to the current cursor position"
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `erigon version 2022.08.3-alpha-15ad43e1`

OS & Version:  Ubuntu 20.04.4 LTS

Commit hash : 

#### Expected behaviour
run normally

#### Actual behaviour
get the error:
```
[EROR] [09-16|01:15:30.661] Staged Sync                              err="[5/16 Bodies] WriteRawBodyIfNotExists: WriteRawTransactions: txId=1741907398, baseTxId=1741907398, bucket: BlockTransaction, mdbx_cursor_put: MDBX_EKEYMISMATCH: The given key value is mismatched to the current cursor position"
```

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
after kill the erigon process, and restart erigon, get the error.


#### Backtrace

````

````
Is there any way to fix the problem? or still have to synchronize from the beginning? This is an archive node. It takes a long time to synchronize from the beginning.

problem sloved!

run the cmd :

make integration
./build/bin/integration state_stages --datadir=<your_datadir> --unwind=1000 --integrity.fast=false --chain=mainnet
./build/bin/integration stage_bodies --datadir=<your_datadir> --unwind=1000 --chain=mainnet
./build/bin/integration stage_headers --datadir=<your_datadir> --unwind=1000 --chain=mainnet
